lyric: 作词 : TetraCalyx
作曲 : 林一凡Fan(HOYO-MiX)
编曲 : 宫奇Gon(HOYO-MiX)/林一凡Fan(HOYO-MiX)
制作人 : 宫奇Gon(HOYO-MiX)
Too much of the past for one to memorize
translation: 过往太漫长，记忆却太短暂

lyric: Too many words remained for one to read through the lines
translation: 留下的文字太多，通读者却寥寥

lyric: The ebb and flow of the crowd floods the world and paradise
translation: 天人之间，众生熙熙攘攘

lyric: Along the path of time
translation: 沿着时间所往

lyric: Every night brings a dream but the day, relentlessly, keeps me awake
translation: 梦境很多，清醒的现实却仅有一个

lyric: All the rest will be torn up whenever a choice is made
translation: 选择其一，其余的便不复存在

lyric: Every living soul in the fray striving for their own safe place
translation: 众生纷扰，为一席安宁之地

lyric: Life is too long to end at a grave
translation: 墓志铭太短，此生太长

lyric: Just a drop of water suffices
translation: 一滴水就已足够

lyric: Encompassed and swallowed through space by the universe
translation: 它被宇宙包藏，它被天地吞吐

lyric: Back to the source
translation: 落叶归根

lyric: Gone are those years living for a reason
translation: 因一个理由而活着的岁月已逝

lyric: Here it comes the moment of the scene of lost and found
translation: 失而复得的时刻终究再临

lyric: Personas played out on the stage
translation: 舞台上戏角无数

lyric: will return to the self when there's a curtain call
translation: 唯一的自我却存在于谢幕之后

lyric: Every night brings a dream but the day, relentlessly, keeps me awake
translation: 梦境很多，清醒的现实却仅有一个

lyric: All the rest will be torn up whenever a choice is made
translation: 选择其一，其余的便不复存在

lyric: Everyone has their own desire leading to the ultimate
translation: 目的很多，最终的结局却仅有一个

lyric: Life is too long to end at a grave
translation: 墓志铭太短，此生太长

lyric: Just a drop of water suffices
translation: 一滴水就已足够

lyric: Still I wish to embrace the world with my thoughts
translation: 而我仍希望用思绪包裹住世界

lyric: A eulogy
translation: 悼词已过

lyric: Time to leave where I have stood so long
translation: 我从此离开了这久伫之地

lyric: Letting you go recover traces overlapped
translation: 你也将重展被折叠的轨迹

lyric: Ends, then begins.
translation: 终，归于始。

lyric: 人声录音Vocal Recording: 徐威@52HzStudio
弦乐Strings: 龙之艺交响乐团 Art of Dragon Symphony Orchestra
混音Mixing Engineer: 宫奇Gon(HOYO-MiX)
母带Mastering Engineer: 宫奇Gon(HOYO-MiX)
出品Produced by ：HOYO-MiX
